summary: This is an email dated October 30, 2019, providing an update on investigative activities related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It mentions a subpoena for her phone tolls, the activation of a PRTT (likely a form of electronic surveillance), and location data placing her phone in Pawtucket, Rhode Island on October 29.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The email is about investigative actions targeting Ghislaine Maxwell, including a subpoena for her phone records and location tracking.

connections.description: The sender is updating 'M' on the status of an investigation targeting Maxwell, indicating they are involved in or monitoring the case.

events.title: PRTT Activation and Location Hit
events.description: A PRTT (Preservation Request, Trap and Trace, or similar electronic surveillance) was activated. Maxwell's phone IP address was located in Pawtucket, Rhode Island.

events.title: Subpoena Issued for Phone Tolls
events.description: A subpoena was issued to obtain toll records (call detail records) for Maxwell's phone.

keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to obtain toll records for Ghislaine Maxwell's phone as of October 30, 2019.
A PRTT (likely a form of electronic surveillance) was activated on October 29, 2019.
On October 29, 2019, Maxwell's phone IP address was geolocated to Pawtucket, Rhode Island.
The email indicates an active investigation into Maxwell's whereabouts and communications in late October 2019.
